name: Big Mega Ramp: Car GT Racing
name_original: Big Mega Ramp: Car GT Racing
description:
There are real impossible stunts of this extreme car racing that will challenge your big ramp car control skills on a large scale among all adventure games in ramp car drift racing game. The trial of player never ends as there are continuous mad tracks that will keep up the difficulty, testing your ramp car race talent through drifting car simulator. Choose the best sports car for yourself which could give you the best impossible stunts and improve your car driving. The best thing about this game is the drifting car simulator which allows you to drive your real race cars and sports car with freedom and feel the fun of extreme stunts.
- Amazing gameplay and Realistic car controls.
- Chance to perform extreme tricks and race on impossible curves tracks.
- Difficult levels of new gt mega vertical racing zigzag tracks.
- Explore the breathtaking 3d environment of huge city.
- Stunning game graphics and sounds.
- Update you cars with different features.
